author: Jim Thomas
comment: It's a well thought out idea and i like it.  But i feel prehaps you should be able to customize the vibrations on wear.  My email vibrates once and facebook is twice so I'm getting them confused.  Prehaps a more powerful vibration option as well for wear?  Its very good and helps keep track of time without constantly pulling out phone.  Well done

reply.author: JonG Mobile Apps
reply.content:
Thank you for the kind review!
I have a few additions lined up for the next update. I will try to include customizable wear vibrations as well.

title: I like it but.....

author: Wally Mahar
comment: the combination of my phone and lg watch r going off really keeps me aware of time!

author: Kevin H.
comment: Works perfectly with my Moto360, keeps my from time traveling. Especially useful when I need to be focusing on work. Much more reliable than using the interval timers on the store for the same purpose. One bug: the bottom half of the configuration app slightly overlaps the top half (OnePlus One with CyanogenMod 12, with on-screen nav bar enabled. if on screen nav is disabled or hidden its fine).

reply.author: JonG Mobile Apps
reply.content:
Thank you for the review!
I'm working on the next update for the app. I'll make sure to include a fix for the layout overlap.
